extendedInfo.description: CCSWE App Manager was designed for users who want to hide icons for applications they do not use without uninstalling the entire application. This is useful for applications like Google Maps that include multiple icons. You can also hide icons for stock system applications which will allow you to continue to receive system updates while saving space in your application drawer.** NOTE: You must have root access in order to use CCSWE App Manager **Contact appmanager@ccswe.com if you have any issues (we cannot provide any assistance with rooting your device). We are more than happy to offer any help we can but cannot do anything if you simply give us a low rating instead of contacting us.Features:- Clear data for any application (including system applications)- Hide (disable) application icons without uninstalling the application- Freeze (disable) applications (Pro version only)- Uninstall any application (including system applications)Frequently asked questions:- Why does CCSWE App Manager require root access?Unfortunately the Android security model does not make it possible for one application to enable/disable components for another application. This makes sense for standard applications because you wouldn't want a competing application to be able to disable yours (ie: install MySpace and it disables Facebook). That is why CCSWE App Manager requires root permissions in order to achieve this.

reviews.title: One small problem
reviews.comment: Briilliant app, i hide navigation, get games and orange plus icons but they keep comming back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Asking for root permission, even after allowing ro permissions
reviews.comment: I waited for 10 mins. After allowing root permissions.  It is going on asking for root permissions.  I will give 5 stars if you fix this. I am using Micromax a73.
reviews.author: JayaKrishnan Thoppil

reviews.title: Nothing Short of Amazing
reviews.comment: This app does exactly what it says.  I can\'t tell you how long I\'ve been looking for something like this.  I love the stock android launcher (jellybean) and do not want to use third party launchers such as nova.  This allows me to hide all those redundant apps showing up in my tray without disabling functionality of said app.  Live wallpapers and clock widgets are good examples of this.   In m opinion, anyone who would give this less than five stars, probably doesn\'t have root access, which is not fair.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It doesnt deserves even this
reviews.comment: It broke my phone. Dont download it!! PD: I have root access.
reviews.author: Jorge Meneu

reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY SUPERB !!!!
reviews.comment: Super duper..... Works exactly as i want it.... Hides it.... Ha ha......lovin it
reviews.author: Aaron Stone

reviews.title: Simple and great!
reviews.comment: Really easy and doesn\'t break any apps that you hide!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nu functioneaza
reviews.comment: Dupa ce ii dau accept la superuser nu mai trece de urm. propozitie \" asking for root permision\" va rog ajutor

reviews.comment: awesome

reviews.title: No more future versions !??
reviews.comment: Even though there are launchers for hiding apps, this is probably the only app that can hide app icons in stock launcher without disabling those hidden apps

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Thank you so much this app is best!

reviews.title: Need improvements
reviews.comment: Really need to show in the list which apps icons are hidden.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good, and much needed functionality
reviews.comment: This app works great so far.  Had some issues like hiding the gmail icon in the app drawer actually hides it everywhere, but nothing i can\'t live with.  Thanks for the app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail app
reviews.comment: App not only hides icons but disables them from use. Unintuitive and slow ui, uninstalling does not restore your phone. Now I have to go back and unchecked everything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs lots of improving
reviews.comment: ...but it is a good start. Suggestions: - show which apps are hidden in the list - multi select batch operation - filters (user, system, hidden)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I hid the search icon from app drawer, but whenever I press the search button, it won\'t pop out the search thingy. And also I hid the flash settings, and now I can\'t use flash in browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Came from XDA
reviews.comment: Works great! UI could be a little more intuitive tho.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant use
reviews.comment: Cant use on my rooted sgs2 gt-i9100g .. Just stay at asking for root permission eventhough I already grant it using supersu
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works wonders!
reviews.comment: Other app I tried to hide icons with made the apps unusable. This really works, fast and easy! Thank You!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesometacular
reviews.comment: Amazing app. Super small, easy to use, visually simple and appealing. Doesn\'t work on quite all apps, but makes your app drawer squeaky clean. Even allows you to un install system apps - sweet! Ironicly you then have this app in your app drawer, but uninstalling this app keeps your hidden apps hidden, and if you reinstall this app you can bring back your hidden apps. Perfection. Will most likely buy the pro version just as a donation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Initially I had an issue with it not recognizing my root but it turns out I hadn\'t upgraded to SuperSU correctly (still not sure why I updated). Once I resolved that this application works great and does what it says. 5 stars all the way!
reviews.author: A Google User
